Text: Time Card Module AccessTIME CARD MODULE IS AVAILABLE FOR EMPLOYEE USE ON THURSDAY DECEMBER Please carefully read the section that applies to you Deadline Due Dates Employees Time Coordinators End of business day on Monday December Supervisors Additional Approvers End of business day on Tuesday December EXEMPT EMPLOYEES Exempt employees only have to prepare a time card if they have an absence to report See your Time Sheet Coordinator for training or you may review the instructions by accessing the EOTT Internet Web Page FAQs Payroll Time Card Time Card Instructions How to use the time card NONEXEMPT EMPLOYEES All nonexempt employees must turn in a time card for the December pay period using the EOTT Time Card Module Your Time Card Coordinator has been trained to use the new system and will train employees who have Internet access or you may review the instructions by accessing the EOTT Internet Web Page FAQs Payroll Time Card Time Card Instructions How to use the time card NOTE California nonexempt and hourly employees will not use the Time Card module they will submit paper time cards for the year ALL EMPLOYEES YOUR LOGON ID IS YOUR SOCIAL SECURITY NUMBER YOUR PASSWORD IS YOUR BIRTHDAY IN DIGITS DO NOT USE DASHES IN THE NUMBERS
